response.overview: Thunderbean presents a great collection of rare, vintage animated commercials from the 40s, 50s, 60s and 70s! Cartoon Commerials, Volume 2 features ads from both small and bigger studios, including the largest collection ever gathered of rare commercials from United Productions of America (UPA), one of the leaders in Mid Century Modern Animation design. It also features Ford Commercials (designed by Dr. Suess and UPA), lots of fun 50s spots, and a nice collection of 60s cereal commercials, scanned and digitally cleaned up from original 16mm film prints. Bonus materials included in the collection are rare theatrical spots for Philips lighting, an animated theatrical ad for Chevy (by Jam Handy company), Still gallery of 'how to create animated spots' from the late 50s, and a rare 5 minute 'Elf' intermission timeclock. A really fun collection and a great primer on advertising in the 50s and 60s!
response.title: Cartoon Commercials!: Vol. 2
